title: Adobe Gives Upbeat Outlook, Though AI Effect Remains Murky
description: Adobe Inc. delivered an upbeat annual forecast but still drew a lukewarm reaction from investors, who have been seeking clearer signs that the software maker can thrive in an era of artificial intelligence.

title: Paramount Letter to Warner Bros. Shareholders Asks for Support
description: Paramount Skydance Corp. released a letter to Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. investors Wednesday asking them to support its tender offer for the entertainment company’s shares and not the rival Netflix Inc. merger.

title: Trump Says Any Warner Bros. Deal Must Include Sale of CNN
description: President Donald Trump signaled opposition to a Warner Bros. Discovery sale that did not see the news network CNN included or sold to a new company, signaling a potential wrinkle for the bid from Netflix. (Source: Bloomberg)
